_val_dir_comment: Separate validation directory (overrides train_split if set)

autoencoder_def._latent_channels_comment: Number of channels in latent space (affects compression ratio). Higher = more info preserved, less compression
autoencoder_def._channels_comment: Channel progression through encoder/decoder levels. Defines model capacity. Higher = more parameters, better quality, slower
autoencoder_def._num_res_blocks_comment: Number of residual blocks per level. More blocks = better quality but slower training
autoencoder_def._norm_num_groups_comment: Number of groups for GroupNorm. Must divide channel counts evenly (e.g., 32 divides 64, 128, 256)
autoencoder_def._norm_eps_comment: Epsilon for numerical stability in normalization
autoencoder_def._attention_levels_comment: Enable self-attention at each level [level1, level2, level3]. true = slower but better quality, false = faster
autoencoder_def._encoder_attn_comment: Non-local attention in encoder bottleneck. Captures global context across the image
autoencoder_def._decoder_attn_comment: Non-local attention in decoder bottleneck. Improves reconstruction quality

regularized_attributes._comment: Unified configuration for AR-VAE attribute regularization
regularized_attributes._attribute_file_comment: JSON containing a_l(x) for each image in the dente dataset

delta_global._comment: Global slope for tanh(delta * Δz). Used only if enabled AND attribute-level delta is disabled.

regularized_attributes._pairwise_comment: Comparison strategy: 'all' = m^2 pairs, 'subset' = random subset for speed
regularized_attributes._subset_pairs_comment: Number of random pairs when pairwise='subset'. Ignored otherwise.

normalize_attributes._comment: Optional normalization applied to all attributes

attribute_latent_mapping._comment: Defines which attributes (string keys) supervise which latent dimensions z_r.

autoencoder_train._lr_comment: Learning rate (auto-scaled by world_size in multi-GPU training). Single GPU: 2.5e-5, 4 GPUs: effective LR = 2.5e-5 × 4
autoencoder_train._perceptual_weight_comment: Weight for VGG perceptual loss. Higher = better texture quality, lower = faster convergence
autoencoder_train._kl_weight_comment: Weight for KL divergence. Controls latent regularization. Too high = blurry reconstructions, too low = unstructured latent. Range: 1e-6 to 1e-5
autoencoder_train._recon_loss_comment: Reconstruction loss type: 'l1' = sharper details, 'l2' = smoother results
autoencoder_train._ar_vae_weight_comment: Weight applied to ∑_l L_{r_l,a_l} in total loss
autoencoder_train._ar_vae_enabled_comment: Enable AR-VAE loss term during training

wandb._enabled_comment: Enable Weights & Biases logging. Set to false to disable
wandb._project_comment: W&B project name. Can be overridden by WANDB_PROJECT env variable
wandb._entity_comment: W&B username or team. If null, uses WANDB_ENTITY from .env file
wandb.name: ar_vae_dente
wandb._name_comment: Run name. If null, auto-generated from run_dir
wandb._tags_comment: Tags for organizing runs in W&B UI
wandb.notes: AR-VAE training with attribute regularization on dente dataset
